roleset.name: get again
roleset.note: RECAPTURE-V NOTES: Vncls steal-10.5. Updated by Julia, 10/2010. (from recapture.01-v)

example.name: transitive
example.text: Most of the volume came from trades-1 designed [*trace*-1]-2 *trace*-2 to recapture the stock's next dividend; Texaco has a yield of 5.6% and goes ex-dividend today.
